content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Mister Peter Schmidt.
name: Emilia Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for the apartment in München.
name: Emilia Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you not reach an agreement?
name: Evaluator

content: We did not reach an agreement because the landlord, Peter Schmidt, believed the price I was offering was too low for his apartment, which was in the city center and newly built. He felt the price should be higher, and I, as a student, was insisting on a price that I considered fair for a student.
name: Emilia Müller

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Why did you give a rating of 8? What were the positive aspects of the negotiation partner?
name: Evaluator

content: I gave a rating of 8 because Mister Schmidt was respectful, clear, and patient throughout the negotiation process. He explained his position clearly and provided reasons for his expectations, demonstrating a professional and reasonable approach.
name: Emilia Müller

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator
